name: Collective: investigative journalism on screen
description: In Collective, documentarian Alexander Nanau follows a team of journalists who uncover a far-reaching government conspiracy following a deadly nightclub fire in Romania that kills dozens.

key_work.title: Collective
key_work.creator_credit: Hanka Kastelicová, Alexander Nanau, Bianca Oana, Bernard Michaux, Participant, Samsa Film, Alexander Nanau Production, HBO Europe, MDR, Centrul National al Cinematografiei (CNC), Luxembourg Film Fund, Sundance Institute, Magnolia Pictures and Antoaneta Opris
key_work.brief_description: In the aftermath of a tragic fire in a Romanian club, burn victims begin dying in hospitals from wounds that were not life threatening. A team of investigative journalists move into action uncovering the mass corruption of the health system and of the state institutions. Collective follows journalists, whistle blowers, and authorities alike. An immersive and uncompromising look into a dysfunctional system, exposing corruption, propaganda, and manipulation that nowadays affect not only Romania, but societies around the world.

end.title: The Pelican brief
end.creator_credit: Alan Pakula, Pieter Jan Brugge and Warner Bros Pictures
end.brief_description: A law student (Julia Roberts) turns her suspicions about the deaths of two Supreme Court Justices into a speculative brief that has the potential to rock the highest levels of government. She and a determined investigative reporter (Denzel Washington) want to expose the scandal to the world, the only challenge is to live to tell the tale. This suspenseful film is based on the best-selling thriller by John Grisham.
